content.rendered:
Privacy Policy

BoxSafe Privacy Policy

BoxSafe Privacy Policy

This privacy policy outlines how BoxSafe (“we,” “us,” or “our”) collects, uses, processes, and protects any personal data that you provide when you visit and use www.boxsafe.com.au (the “website”). By accessing and using the website, you agree to the collection and use of your personal data as described in this policy. This policy is subject to change without notice, and we encourage you to check it regularly. Continued use of the website after changes are made constitutes your acceptance of the updated policy.

Changes to the Privacy Policy

We reserve the right to update or modify this privacy policy at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting to the website, and users will not be individually notified. It is your responsibility to review the privacy policy periodically. Your continued use of the website following any changes means that you accept and agree to the revised policy. If you do not agree with any part of this policy, you should immediately discontinue the use of our website and services.

User Data We Collect

To provide you with the best possible service, BoxSafe may collect various types of information when you visit the website or interact with our services, including but not limited to:

  • Your IP address
  • Contact Information: Your email address, name, and other personal information you may provide when filling out forms or subscribing to our services
  • Demographic Information: Data related to your preferences, interests, and activities on the website, including behavior such as pages visited, time spent on certain pages, and other engagement metrics
  • Data Related to Website Interaction: This may include tracking user behavior, collecting information about how you interact with different sections of the website, and monitoring usage patterns to improve our content delivery and user experience.

Why We Collect Your Data

We collect this data for several legitimate purposes, including but not limited to:

  • Improvement of Services: We use the data to better understand your needs and preferences to improve the content, layout, and services provided through the website.
  • Personalization: By analyzing your data, we can tailor the website experience to better suit your individual interests and online behavior, improving user satisfaction and engagement.
  • Promotional Activities: With your consent, we may use your contact information to send you promotional emails about products, services, or events that we believe may be of interest to you. You may opt out of receiving these emails at any time.
  • Market Research: We may occasionally contact you for feedback on your experience with BoxSafe, invite you to participate in surveys, or ask for input to improve our offerings.
  • Website Analytics: We collect data to conduct statistical analysis to better understand how users interact with the website. This data helps us monitor website traffic, identify usage trends, and make necessary improvements.

Data Retention Policy

We retain personal data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, or as required by law. Different retention periods apply to different types of data, depending on the nature of the data and the purposes for which it was collected. After this period, we will securely delete or anonymize your data.

Data Security and Liability

BoxSafe is committed to implementing appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure the protection of your personal data. We use industry-standard security protocols, such as SSL/TLS for data transmission, AES-256 encryption, firewalls, and secure servers to prevent unauthorized access, data theft, or disclosure. However, no system is completely immune to risks.

If a data breach occurs, BoxSafe and Vertex Digital Development will not be liable for any loss, theft, or misuse of your data, nor for any resulting damages. You are responsible for taking additional security measures to protect your personal information, such as using strong passwords, regularly updating your software, and monitoring your accounts for unauthorized activity.

By using the website, you assume all risks associated with data transmission over the internet and agree to indemnify and hold BoxSafe and its partners harmless from any legal claims or liabilities arising from security breaches or data loss, unless negligence by BoxSafe can be proven.

Third-Party Processors and Data Sharing

BoxSafe may share your data with trusted third-party service providers (such as hosting services, payment processors, and email marketing providers) to facilitate the functionality of our website and services. All third-party processors are required to adhere to similar data protection standards as set forth in this policy.

We will not sell, lease, or share your personal information with any third parties for marketing purposes without your explicit consent. However, we may share your data if required by law or in response to valid legal processes.

International Data Transfers

If personal data is transferred internationally, BoxSafe ensures that appropriate safeguards are in place, such as Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) or other legally approved mechanisms, to protect your personal data.

Our Cookie Policy

When you visit our website, you agree to our use of cookies to collect data about your online behavior. Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help us analyze web traffic, monitor user activity, and enhance your experience on our site.

We will ask for your explicit consent to use cookies, especially for non-essential cookies such as those used for tracking or marketing purposes. You can manage or revoke your consent at any time through your browser settings. For more information on how to disable cookies, visit https://www.internetcookies.com.

Links to Third-Party Websites

The website may contain links to external websites. Please note that BoxSafe is not responsible for the content, privacy policies, or security practices of any third-party sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any websites you visit before providing personal information.

User Rights Under Data Protection Laws

Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have the following rights regarding your personal data:

  • Right to Access: You can request a copy of the personal data we hold about you.
  • Right to Rectification: You can ask us to correct any inaccuracies in your data.
  • Right to Erasure: You can request the deletion of your personal data when it is no longer necessary for the purposes for which it was collected, or if you withdraw your consent.
  • Right to Restrict Processing: You can ask us to limit the processing of your data under certain circumstances.
  • Right to Data Portability: You can request that we transfer your data to another service provider in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format.

To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at support@boxsafe.com.au. We will respond to your request within the timeframe required by law.

Withdrawing Consent

If you have previously agreed to our use of your personal data, you can withdraw your consent at any time by contacting us at support@boxsafe.com.au. Withdrawing consent may affect your ability to use certain features of the website or services, but it will not affect the lawfulness of processing conducted prior to your withdrawal.

Legal Requirements and Compliance

We may disclose your personal data if required by law or if we believe in good faith that such disclosure is necessary to comply with legal obligations, protect our rights, or investigate potential violations of this policy. BoxSafe will not be liable for any disclosures made in compliance with legal requirements or valid legal processes.

Limitations of Liability

BoxSafe, Vertex Digital Development, and their affiliates will not be held liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from:

  • Your use of the website or services, including any errors, omissions, or inaccuracies in the information provided.
  • Any data breaches, unauthorized access, or misuse of your personal data, regardless of the security measures in place.
  • Your failure to comply with this privacy policy or relevant data protection laws.

By using the website, you assume all responsibility for any risks associated with the collection, storage, and use of your data, and you agree to indemnify and hold BoxSafe harmless from any claims or damages arising from your use of the website or related services.

Still have any questions or concerns?

Please get in touch with our friendly and supportive team

Contact Us
